00031 class RealBase: public Function {
00032     public:
00035         typedef VecMath::Vector<4> &function_type(double, double, double);
00037         typedef VecMath::Vector<4> raw_function_type (double, double, double);
00038 
00039         RealBase() { }
00041         RealBase(const QString &name,
00042                  double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00043                  double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00044                  double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00045                  ParameterMap _parms = ParameterMap()):
00046                 Function(name, _parms),
00047                 tmin (_tmin), tmax (_tmax), dt (_dt),
00048                 umin (_umin), umax (_umax), du (_du),
00049                 vmin (_vmin), vmax (_vmax), dv (_dv),
00050                 tsteps (unsigned ((tmax-tmin)/dt+1)),
00051                 usteps (unsigned ((umax-umin)/du+1)),
00052                 vsteps (unsigned ((vmax-vmin)/dv+1)) { }
00053 
00054     protected:
00056         unsigned &getTsteps() { return tsteps; }
00058         unsigned getTsteps() const { return tsteps > 0? tsteps: 1; }
00060         unsigned &getUsteps() { return usteps; }
00062         unsigned getUsteps() const { return usteps > 0? usteps: 1; }
00064         unsigned &getVsteps()  { return vsteps; }
00066         unsigned getVsteps() const { return vsteps > 0? vsteps: 1; }
00067 
00068         double &getTmin() { return tmin; }          
00069         double getTmin() const { return tmin; }     
00070         double &getTmax() { return tmax; }          
00071         double getTmax() const { return tmax; }     
00072         double &getDt() { return dt; }              
00073         const double &getDt() const { return dt; }  
00074         double &getUmin() { return umin; }          
00075         double getUmin() const { return umin; }     
00076         double &getUmax() { return umax; }          
00077         double getUmax() const { return umax; }     
00078         double &getDu() { return du; }              
00079         const double &getDu() const { return du; }  
00080         double &getVmin() { return vmin; }          
00081         double getVmin() const { return vmin; }     
00082         double &getVmax() { return vmax; }          
00083         double getVmax() const { return vmax; }     
00084         double &getDv() { return dv; }              
00085         const double &getDv() const { return dv; }  
00086 
00088         virtual VecMath::Vector<4> &f(double, double, double) = 0;
00090 
00094         VecMath::Vector<4> &operator () (double t, double u, double v) {
00095             return f(t,u,v);
00096         }
00097 
00098         static double _min, 
00099                       _max, 
00100                       _d;   
00101 
00102     private:
00103         double tmin, 
00104                tmax, 
00105                dt,   
00106                umin, 
00107                umax, 
00108                du,   
00109                vmin, 
00110                vmax, 
00111                dv;   
00112         unsigned tsteps, 
00113                  usteps, 
00114                  vsteps; 
00115 };
00116

00129 class RealFunction: public RealBase {
00130     public:
00131         RealFunction(const QString &name);
00132         RealFunction (const QString &name,
00133                       double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00134                       double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00135                       double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00136                       ParameterMap _parms = ParameterMap());
00137         virtual ~RealFunction() { }
00138 
00139         virtual void Transform (const VecMath::Rotation<4> &R,
00140                                 const VecMath::Vector<4> &T);
00141         virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);
00142         virtual void Draw (void);
00143 
00144         virtual void ReInit(double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00145                             double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00146                             double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv);
00147 
00149         virtual const unsigned getDefinitionSpaceDimensions() { return 3; }
00150 
00151     protected:
00152         VecMath::Vector<4> &normal(double t, double u, double v);
00153 
00154         void DrawPlane (unsigned);
00155         void DrawStrip (unsigned, unsigned);
00156         void DrawCube (unsigned, unsigned, unsigned);
00157 
00158         virtual void Initialize (void);
00159         virtual void InitMem (void);
00160 
00161         vec4vec3D X,      
00162                   Xtrans; 
00163         vec3vec3D Xscr;   
00164 
00165         VecMath::Vector<4> F;
00166 
00167 
00168 };
00169 
00170 
00171 /*******************************************************************************
00172  *
00173  *  classes which implement RealFunction::f (double, double, double) follow
00174  *  the descendants may also implement Function::df () and Function::normal (),
00175  *  but need not
00176  */
00177

00189 class Hypersphere: public RealFunction {
00190     public:
00191         Hypersphere(): RealFunction("Hypersphere"), Radius(1.) { }
00192         Hypersphere (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00193                      double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00194                      double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00195                      double _rad = 1);
00196         virtual ~Hypersphere() { }
00197         virtual void SetParameters(const ParameterMap &);
00198 
00199     protected:
00200         virtual function_type f;
00201         virtual function_type normal;
00202 
00203         double Radius;
00204 };
00205 
00206 namespace {
00207     Function *createHypersphere() { return new Hypersphere(); }
00208     const bool registeredR1 = TheFunctionFactory::Instance().registerFunction("Hypersphere", createHypersphere);
00209 }

00218 class Torus1: public RealFunction {
00219     public:
00220         Torus1(): RealFunction("Torus1"), R(2.), r(1.), rho(0.5) { }
00221         Torus1 (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00222                 double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00223                 double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00224                 double _R = 2, double _r = 1, double _rho = 0.5);
00225         virtual ~Torus1() { }
00226         virtual void SetParameters(const ParameterMap &parms) {
00227     //  parms["Radius"].value must be set!
00228 #if 1
00229     for (ParameterMap::const_iterator i = parms.begin(); i != parms.end(); ++i) {
00230         if (i->second->getName() == "Major Radius") R = double(*i->second);
00231         if (i->second->getName() == "Minor Radius") r = double(*i->second);
00232         if (i->second->getName() == "Micro Radius") rho = double(*i->second);
00233     }
00234 #else
00235     setParameter(parms, this->R, "Major Radius");
00236     setParameter(parms, this->r, "Minor Radius");
00237     setParameter(parms, this->rho, "Micro Radius");
00238 #endif
00239 }
00240 
00241     protected:
00242         virtual function_type f;
00243 
00244         double R;       
00245         double r;       
00246         double rho;     
00247 };
00248 
00249 namespace {
00250     Function *createTorus1() { return new Torus1(); }
00251     const bool registeredR2 = TheFunctionFactory::Instance().registerFunction("Torus1", createTorus1);
00252 }

00259 class Torus2: public RealFunction {

00263                 double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00264                 double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00265                 double _R = 1, double _r = 0.5);
00266         virtual ~Torus2 () { }
00267         virtual void SetParameters(const ParameterMap &parms) {
00268             //  parms["Radius"].value must be set!
00269 #if 1
00270             for (ParameterMap::const_iterator i = parms.begin();
00271                  i != parms.end(); ++i) {
00272                 if (i->second->getName() == "Major Radius")
00273                     R = double(*i->second);
00274                 if (i->second->getName() == "Minor Radius")
00275                     r = double(*i->second);
00276             }
00277 #else
00278             setParameter(parms, this->R, "Major Radius");
00279             setParameter(parms, this->r, "Minor Radius");
00280 #endif
00281         }
00282 
00283     protected:
00284         virtual function_type f;
00285 
00286         double R;   
00287         double r;   
00288 };

00324 class GravitationPotential: public RealFunction {
00325     public:
00326         GravitationPotential(): RealFunction("GravitationPotential"), M(1.), R(0.25) { }
00327         GravitationPotential (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00328                               double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00329                               double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00330                               double _M = 1, double _R = 0.25);
00331         virtual ~GravitationPotential () { }
00332         virtual void SetParameters(const ParameterMap &parms) {
00333 #if 1
00334             for (ParameterMap::const_iterator i = parms.begin();
00335                  i != parms.end(); ++i) {
00336                 if (i->second->getName() == "M") M = double(*i->second);
00337                 if (i->second->getName() == "R") R = double(*i->second);
00338             }
00339 #else
00340             setParameter(parms, this->M, "M");
00341             setParameter(parms, this->R, "R");
00342 #endif
00343         }
00344 
00345     protected:
00346         virtual function_type f;
00347 
00348         double M,               //  not really M, but M/R^3
00349                R;
00350 };
00351 
00352 namespace {
00353     Function *createGravitationPotential() { return new GravitationPotential(); }
00354     const bool registeredR5 = TheFunctionFactory::Instance().registerFunction("GravitationPotential", createGravitationPotential);
00355 }

00418 class PolarSin: public RealFunction {
00419     public:
00420         PolarSin(): RealFunction("PolarSin"), Phase(2.) { }
00421         PolarSin (double _tmin, double _tmax, double _dt,
00422                   double _umin, double _umax, double _du,
00423                   double _vmin, double _vmax, double _dv,
00424                   double _phase = 2);
00425         virtual ~PolarSin () { }
00426 
00427         virtual void SetParameters(const ParameterMap &parms) {
00428 #       if 1
00429             for (ParameterMap::const_iterator i = parms.begin();
00430                  i != parms.end(); ++i) {
00431                 if (i->second->getName() == "Phase") Phase = double(*i->second);
00432             }
00433 #       else
00434             setParameter(parms, this->Phase, "Phase");
00435 #       endif
00436         }
00437 
00438     protected:
00439         virtual function_type f;
00440         double Phase;               
00441 };
